title: Gatsby and Nick are outside and the gardener informs Gatsby about draining the pool. Gatsby asks him to postpone it. Nick prepares to leave for the city, missing his train because he doesn't want to leave Gatsby.
text:
he rhythm of
the year, summing up the sadness and suggestiveness of life in new
tunes. All night the saxophones wailed the hopeless comment of the
“Beale Street Blues” while a hundred pairs of golden and silver
slippers shuffled the shining dust. At the grey tea hour there were
always rooms that throbbed incessantly with this low, sweet fever,
while fresh faces drifted here and there like rose petals blown by

relations.explanation: Gatsby kissed Daisy's "curious and lovely mouth", showing romantic affection. He was also "overwhelmingly aware of the youth and mystery" of Daisy. They had never been closer in their month of love, nor communicated more profoundly one with another, than when she brushed silent lips against his coat’s shoulder or when he touched the end of her fingers, gently, as though she were asleep.
